metadata.description: The world's first and best AI QR code generator.

style.title: Style
style.subtitle: Swipe left or right to view more

params.url_too_long: The length of URL should be less than 150
params.prompt_too_long: The length of prompt should be less than 1024

0.a: Enter any content you want in the positive prompt. Adjust the control strength according to the link length. The current model performs well in landscapes, objects, and architecture.

1.a:
QRBTF stands for "QR Code Beautifier" and it born out of a university course project of CUC. It was then that we began using methods of generative art to hide the QR codes within lines, bubbles, pixel art, and a variety of other intriguing patterns. The project has been open-sourced on GitHub, and remains accessible at classic.qrbtf.com.

In June 2023, pioneering the fusion of QR codes with generative AI, we utilized ControlNet and Stable Diffusion to create the world's first AI-generated QR code. Afterward, we shared it on platforms like Reddit, where it garnered widespread attention.

Now, we have reconstructed the entire website, combining the parametric part and the AI part, bringing a new smooth experience.

2.q: What kind of QR codes can I generate?
2.a: You can generate QR codes of various forms based on URL links, prompt words, and various parameters, as long as the content of the URL is legal and compliant, and the prompt words do not contain political, pornographic, and other illegal and irregular content. As stated in the user agreement, the platform is not responsible for any illegal content generated by any user.

3.q: Can the generated QR codes always be scanned?
3.a: Not necessarily, and we do not make any guarantees. Some parameters have a significant impact on the success rate of scanning. Please use the target scanner for verification. Generally, the recognition rates of WeChat and iOS "Scanner" apps are relatively high.

4.q: How to improve the recognition rate of QR codes?
4.a: The control weight and error correction rate of QR codes are two important parameters for improving the scanning recognition rate. The higher the control weight of the QR code, the higher the contrast of the generated image and the more it deviates from the prompt word. The lower the control weight, the more difficult the generated image is to be recognized, but it will have a more natural visual effect, and it needs to be adjusted properly for different prompt words and seeds. The error correction rate of the QR code determines the density of the information points in the QR code and needs to be adjusted appropriately according to the length of the URL. In addition, trying different seeds can also be helpful.

5.q: Why is the main body of the QR code's image broken, such as the face/body of a character being difficult to recognize?
5.a: Since the current version of the model is optimized for landscapes, for this situation with characters, you can reduce the control strength, increase the restoration ratio, and switch to a larger resolution such as 1536.

6.a: We will soon launch a gallery with more case studies, as well as update a more powerful version of the model.

message.3: Introducing the world's first AI generated QR code.
message.5: QRBTF v3 released. Remade from the ground up using Next.js.

benefits.2: Various Styles With No Backend Required

g1.title: G1
g1.subtitle: Generative AI QR code
g1.desc: Version realv2 | Specializes in realistic landscapes and objects

prompt.label: Prompt
prompt.desc: Keywords to generate QR code image, in any language.

control_strength.label: Control strength
control_strength.desc: Higher strength makes QR code easier to scan but makes image look more like a QR code; lower strength creates more natural images but may be harder to scan. Recommended: 1.0~1.3

restoration_rate.label: Restoration rate
restoration_rate.desc: Higher values make image details clearer. For complex scenes, set to 0.3~0.5; for simple scenes, you can lower or disable it

size.label: Size
size.desc: Larger size allows for more elements and bigger composition ratio in the image

padding_ratio.label: Padding ratio
padding_ratio.desc: Adjusts the proportion of QR code in the entire image. Lower value means larger QR code area. Default: 0.2

correct_level.label: Correct level
correct_level.desc: Longer links require higher correction levels for scanning, but will make QR code elements more visible in the image

anchor_style.label: Anchor style
anchor_style.desc: Square and circle anchors are easier to recognize but more noticeable; minimal option tries to hide QR code elements

not_found.title: Page not found
not_found.tagline: Sorry, we couldn't find the page you're looking for.
